citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:55 p.m. on
September 29, 2025 . The inspector spoke to the licensee in person. The licensee stated she had a prior commitment and
would not be available to complete the inspection today. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:55 p.m. on 
September 29, 2025 . The inspector spoke to the licensee in person. The licensee stated she had a prior commitment and 
would not be available to complete the inspection today. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
